cn.trackCensoredName: TA - 一对一聊天，遇见对的人
cn.trackName: TA - 一对一聊天，遇见对的人
cn.description:
《TA》自上线以来，已成功配对了几十万对！他们从最开始的相遇，再慢慢相恋。

很多人找不到对象的真正原因是缺乏认识异性的途径，《TA》正是一条认识异性的好途径。

《TA》会根据年龄、学历、兴趣爱好等维度进行配对，把最合适两人配成一对，再进行一对一聊天。

每个APP都有一个定位，《TA》的定位是【靠谱】。如果你想找到男朋友、女朋友、结婚对象，那欢迎你。

-----联系我们-----
如在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请联系我们：
- 在线帮助：在TA中选择“我” -> “意见反馈”
- 邮件服务：shiyixin0420@163.com（如果是帐号问题，请在邮件中注明出问题的帐号）

-----连续订阅说明-----
- TA提供按月、按季、按年三种周期订阅。
- 费用将在确认购买时通过你的 iTunes 账号收取。
- 根据App Store自动续约规则，会员会在订阅期结束前24小时内自动续约（含免费试用），你可以在会员订阅期结束前至少24小时取消订阅。
- 通过账号设置 - 管理订阅来取消订阅。
- 条款与隐私政策：https://www.bokuigo.cn/misterrightPrivacyPolicy/index.jsp

cn.trackName: 实时天气Pro -国家天气预报&空气质量
cn.description:
国家天气（National weather) - 实时提供未来15天天气预报、全球雷达、台风实时路径及预报、地震、空气品质、未来15天（360小时）每小时天气预报、花粉过敏、钓鱼、室外运动、降雨概率、当前实时天气等功能。无广告免费天气App。

****准确、实时、15日天气预报****
    实时更新当前天气。
    定位地址精确到街道门牌号，天气精确到所在位置周边1.2KM范围内。
    更新地址，实时更新天气信息。
    15日全球天气预报，出行计划更保障。

****15日（360小时）每小时天气预报****
    未来15日，每个小时的天气情况
    每小时支持天气、温度、体感温度、气压、紫外线、露点、能见度、风向、风速、云层覆盖率、降雨概率、降雨量、降雪量、钓鱼指数、运动指数等等
    更细致准确的出行规划

****地震****
    支持近200年，共72万条地震记录。并及时更新最新地震信息。
    地震可在地图内展示，提供地震震级、强度、深度，致死率预估、强度图、影响城市，海啸、山体滑坡、地震液化等不同等级预警。
    地震数据繁杂难懂，我们提供每个指标的通俗化提示。

****卫星雷达****
    提供台风等级、运动路径、影响范围等在地图内展示。
    支持雷达、云图、24小时降雨量、24小时降雪量、雷电、温度、体感温度、紫外线、露点、温度、驾驶难度信息及未来预报，在地图上展示。

****Apple Watch****
    支持Apple Watch，以及表盘复杂功能。

****支持 Widget****
    支持桌面widget，显示当前天气、温度、体感温度、风向、风速、紫外线、湿度，未来6小时天气及未来2天天气预报
    支持锁屏widget，显示当前天气、温度、体感温度、风向、风速、紫外线、湿度等。

****花粉过敏预报****
    为花粉过敏用户提供未来15天的所在位置的花粉过敏信息

****生活指数****
    钓鱼：支持未来15天每小时钓鱼指数
    运动：支持未来15天每小时运动指数
    是否携带雨伞提醒
    防晒指数及提醒
    穿衣指数及提醒
    洗车至少及提醒
    显示当前日期日历

****个性、美观****
    收录各地美丽风景作为天气背景图片，更简洁美观
    用户可以自定义壁纸，更有个性，将您喜爱的图片设置为天气背景

cn.description:
Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. 

USERS SAY…

The best
Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP
Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE
• Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025.
• Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine.
• Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps.
• Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom.

DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS
• Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads.
• Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless.
• Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy.
• Privacy Focused: No account required.

MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world.

PROVEN SUCCESS
• Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week
• Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps

A few of the free version features:
• Easy food, exercise, and water tracking.
• Daily coaching tips and meal reminders.
• Customizable dashboard for your goals.
• iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support.
• Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos.

SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES
• Up to 108 nutrients tracked
• Plan macros
• Full set of charts
• Timestamps
• Carb tracking

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

• Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback.
• Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols.
• Macros planning and cycling.
• Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos.
• Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition.
• Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings.
• In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet.

Subscription Terms:
The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html

cn.description:
我们原创的电影效果模拟器应用程序非常逼真，甚至被用于拍摄奥斯卡获奖纪录片《寻找小糖人》中的场景！

轻松实时录制8毫米复古影片，即时可得、无需胶片和冲印。

8毫米相机带您进入时光通道，在手机或iPad的镜头中重现老电影的独特魅力。本相机附送多种镜头和胶片，轻松组合出上百种独特的怀旧风格，让您重温往日美好情怀。无论您需要添加灰尘、划痕、复古色调、光影闪动、漏光还是画面抖动，通过手指轻轻一点即可完成。

使用实时胶片效果拍摄照片和视频

▶ 结合胶片颜色、光晕、灰尘和划痕、胶片颗粒和柔化效果，打造真正的老派电影
▶ 调整效果的强度以实现自己独特的视觉风格
▶ 10种型号镜头（边框）、21套来自不同时代的复古胶片
▶ 另加21套精确复刻电影史上一些最具标志性的真实胶片和过期胶片 - 可以通过订阅/购买8mm Pro获得
▶ 添加逼真的放映机音效，静音以模仿默片或者打开麦克录音
▶ 模拟8毫米幻灯机，使画面上下随机抖动
▶ 支持最高4K 30帧的实时特效录影、在较新的设备上可同时录制不加滤镜的视频

用于电影创作的紧凑型编辑器

▶ 将胶片和边框效果添加到视频或照片
▶ 剪辑视频，平移和缩放照片
▶ 从音乐库添加配乐
▶ 从5个独特的主题模版中选择匹配的标题、过渡

通过订阅解锁所有功能

▶ 您可以通过订阅解锁所有的滤镜
▶ 7天免费试用、试用期结束后，您将被收取年度订阅费
▶ 除非在当前订阅期结束前至少24小时关闭自动续订，否则您的订阅将自动续订。您可以前往“设置”> Apple ID > ”订阅“以关闭自动续订
▶ 您也可以选择一次性购买8mm Pro以解锁所有功能

cn.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/

cn.description:
我们的应用实时连接到YouTube，让您播放任何视频，并拥有专为您设计的独家功能！
主要功能亮点：
• 锁屏播放：在后台持续收听您视频的音频。
• 浮动播放（画中画）：在观看视频时使用其他应用。
• 睡眠定时器：设置自动关闭，安心放松。
• 循环模式：无限循环播放您喜欢的视频。
此外还包括：
• 可切换字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 质量选择和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，实时建议（预测搜索）
• 上传日期筛选：按天、周、月或年
FyTube非常适合不想错过任何喜欢主题视频的用户。
尽情探索、播放并享受您喜爱的内容——无干扰！

特别功能
浮动播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他应用时继续观看视频。
只需进入全屏模式，点击画中画按钮——它是播放器顶部的第二个图标。
无论打开哪个应用，您的视频都会浮动在屏幕顶部！

锁屏播放
无中断收听！
即使屏幕关闭，也能继续享受视频音频。非常适合开车或休息时听音乐、播客或喜欢的曲目。
如何激活？
只需锁定设备屏幕，即刻会看到后台播放器。
点击播放——音频将持续不断。

睡眠定时器
安然入睡——应用会自动停止！
启用此功能后，视频将在您设定的时间后自动停止。非常适合睡觉或小憩，无需担心忘记关闭。
如何激活？
点击定时器按钮，选择运行时间，就完成了。
放松，剩下的交给应用！

循环模式
反复播放您喜欢的视频！
启用此功能，视频会自动重复播放任意次数。
怎么知道它是否开启？
激活时图标会变红。
（支持VoiceOver：会提示开启或关闭状态。）
非常适合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜欢反复播放的内容！

需要帮助使用这些功能？访问：fydub.com/fytube

基本功能
• 全屏高清播放
• 简单易用的界面，友好设计
• 随时快进或倒退——不错过精彩部分
• 启用字幕
• 根据喜好调整播放速度
• 更改视频质量
• 智能搜索，实时建议和上传日期筛选：天、周、月、年、全部
• 每个视频包含相关视频区，发现更多有趣内容
• 发现最新视频，保持资讯更新
• 应用直接连接YouTube，让您找到任何视频
• 支持任何兼容AirPlay的设备播放

这是一款革新式的Roguelite游戏：

cn.sellerName: Xiamen Kuaibaoyou Network Technology Co., Ltd
cn.releaseNotes: 《打造世界》iOS端云存档功能上线——存档一键上传，丢档不再！
cn.description:
《打造世界》结合了策略、方块建造沙盒以及塔防多种元素。游戏中，你不是一个人在战斗，需要带领矮人部落在这个充满危险生物的随机世界里进行探索，安排他们分工合作收集资源，制作需要的物品、武器和盔甲，以及建造城堡，来抵御危险生物的入侵。

【世界探索、沙盒生存】
游戏共有七个不同的世界（游戏本体4个地图+3个dlc地图），每个世界都是随机生成的岛屿，你可以在游戏中自由的改变地形地貌。不同世界有着各自的地理及生物特色，同时也暗藏各类怪物和BOSS。带上大聪明矮人征服各个世界吧！

【资源采集、制作发展】
游戏中挖掘矿藏、捕捉动物、打败敌人、种植农田等等方式获得原料；升级科技树，制作数百种完全不同的物品！要知道除了常规的武器、建筑材料、食物、炼金药水外，你甚至建造一个广大的矿井网，配上升降机和铁路，快速抵达藏有最珍贵金属的矿脉中。如何发展矮人部落，你可要好好思考一下。
对了，必须得告诉你，游戏中存在各种魔法，比如打开传送门，提高矮人运输资源的效率；使用魔法之光照亮黑暗的洞穴吓跑怪物；使用降水或是魔法森林加快树木成长，或者是使用指南针魔法找到隐藏资源，从而帮助加快资源开采，探索世界。

【自由建造、殖民管理】
发展一个部落可没那么容易，你需要安排矮人们的衣食住行，可以直接控制矮人进行挖掘、砍伐、攻击、建造等操作，并在矮人与怪物和BOSS战斗时使用魔法帮助他们。
在游戏刚开始时，你只有1位矮人，随着在这个世界的等级提升，会获得更多的矮人；而随着人数越来越多，部落规模也越来越大的。
部落的发展，建筑是必不可少的，发挥你天马星空的想象吧，无论是建古代宫殿风格、还是想要征服天空的空中住宅、又或者是结合现代科技坚不可摧的堡垒，只要你脑洞够大，创造独属于你的矮人之家！

【即时战略&塔防战斗】
有些怪物会成群结队的来掠夺矮人资源，有些怪物会定期从传送门而来攻打矮人，你需要带领矮人建立攻防系统，在的堡垒周围的路上设满陷阱和导弹塔，抵抗成群结队入侵而来的敌人。

【DLC拓展内容】
丰富的DLC内容拓展既可以带你领略不一样的世界：融合中式风格元素的《龙之神庙》、家园领地保卫战的《孤山世界》、暗黑领主和矮人的终极决战《邪恶之心》，还可以让你在世界探索中增加更多乐趣：女矮人携宠物及新装备登场的《姐妹连》、在神秘的斯芬克斯的沙漠世界探索神庙的《废弃矿山》、充满了植物和古老的魔法的《贪婪洞窟》，召唤英雄战士和法师的《英雄对决》，对抗更加强大的地下深渊头目的《怪物联盟》。

【联系我们】

hk.description:
Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. 

USERS SAY…

The best
Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP
Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE
• Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025.
• Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine.
• Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps.
• Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom.

DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS
• Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads.
• Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless.
• Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy.
• Privacy Focused: No account required.

MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world.

PROVEN SUCCESS
• Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week
• Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps

A few of the free version features:
• Easy food, exercise, and water tracking.
• Daily coaching tips and meal reminders.
• Customizable dashboard for your goals.
• iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support.
• Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos.

SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES
• Up to 108 nutrients tracked
• Plan macros
• Full set of charts
• Timestamps
• Carb tracking

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

• Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback.
• Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols.
• Macros planning and cycling.
• Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos.
• Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition.
• Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings.
• In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet.

To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. hk.releaseNotes: Thank you for playing Evoland 2! We're keeping the game up to date and fixing issues.
hk.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

hk.description:
在你進行遊戲時，你將解鎖新技術、遊戲系統以及更加進步的圖像。從黑白到全3D圖像、回合制到即時頭目戰鬥。Evoland讓你體驗冒險遊戲的不斷進化，這一切都透過許多幽默及經典遊戲瞬間所達成。

- 遊玩動作冒險類遊戲歷史之旅
- 發現許多改變，從老派的2D動作/冒險到啟用實時戰鬥和全3D動作。
- 重新造訪以全3D渲染的初始區域，或用自己的飛船探索地表世界！
- 享受地下城、謎題和一系列待揭發的秘密，還有數以百計的成就和星星可供收集。

前次更新內容 
- 增加了西班牙文/中文/韓文本地化文字
- 增加了 GameCenter 服務。
- 錯誤修正

hk.releaseNotes:
為了將您的體驗提升到全新層次，我們帶來了三項令人驚艷的新功能：
• 強化版 VoiceOver：提供更清晰、詳盡的描述，讓視障使用者操作更方便。
• 智慧預測搜尋：即時建議，幫助您在數秒內找到想要的內容。
• 新增睡眠計時器：可自動停止播放，讓您在休息或入睡時更安心。
hk.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 質量選擇和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，即時建議（預測搜索）
• 上傳日期篩選：按天、週、月或年
FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。
如何激活？
點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！
啟用此功能，視頻會自動重複播放任意次數。
怎麼知道它是否開啟？
啟動時圖標會變紅。
（支援VoiceOver：會提示開啟或關閉狀態。）
非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！

需要幫助使用這些功能？訪問：fydub.com/fytube

基本功能
• 全屏高清播放
• 簡單易用的介面，友好設計
• 隨時快進或倒退——不錯過精彩部分
• 啟用字幕
• 根據喜好調整播放速度
• 更改視頻質量
• 智能搜索，即時建議和上傳日期篩選：天、週、月、年、全部
• 每個視頻包含相關視頻區，發現更多有趣內容
• 發現最新視頻，保持資訊更新
• 應用直接連接YouTube，讓您找到任何視頻
• 支援任何兼容AirPlay的設備播放
• 支援VoiceOver（增強描述）
• 無需帳號
• 未經您允許，不儲存快取、Cookie或個人資料——安全觀看
• 介面支援29種語言
• 無廣告，無訂閱
購買FyTube一次付費，開啟無廣告無訂閱的新串流體驗。

最低要求：
• iOS 13或更高版本
• 3G及以上網路連接

隱私政策：
https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube
服務條款：
https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube

與我們應用相關的關鍵詞：
youtube，youtube音樂，youtube vanced，YouTube廣告攔截器，無訂閱，跳過YouTube廣告，無廣告音樂，無廣告，YouTube應用，YouTube廣告屏蔽，攔截彈窗，移除廣告，屏蔽廣告，廣告攔截，內容屏蔽，無廣告，無廣告瀏覽器，攔截廣告，跳過廣告，無廣告音樂，無廣告YouTube，無廣告視頻等。

有關如何使用FyTube的問題？
訪問fydub.com/fytube或聯繫我們——我們樂意為您服務。所有郵件均有回覆：fytube@fydub.com

hk.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

hk.description:
用悠揚樂聲拯救世界，全新體驗的繪本風角色扮演音樂遊戲！
扮演主角探索地圖，以音樂遊戲進行「調律」，讓黑白無聲的世界恢復生機。
隨著劇情演進，逐步解鎖遊玩多樣風格的樂曲，享受令人震撼的boss關卡演出，與欣賞精美的繪本故事！

《獎項與成就》

2016 國際行動遊戲大獎 1st IMGA SEA「最佳音樂音效獎 Excellence in Audio」
2016 GAME STAR遊戲之星票選Taiwan Indie Game項目金獎
2017 台北國際電玩展 獨立遊戲獎 Indie Game Award 「最佳音樂音效獎 Best Audio」
2017 13th IMGA Global 入圍
2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia 「最佳行動遊戲 Best Mobile Game」 入圍

《遊戲特色》

>> 新穎動感的音樂遊戲

獨創多變的盤面動畫，隨著音樂節奏點擊滑動，遊玩數十位作曲家創作的高品質樂曲，和觀看魄力十足的boss關卡特別演出。我們為音樂遊戲的初學者到專業玩家分別打造適合的難易度與挑戰課題，鍛鍊自己的實力同時解鎖隱藏要素吧！

>> 精緻迷人的繪本故事

「我相信，受音律眷顧的你一定可以恢復世界原本的秩序。」
當各地點的紊亂能量藉由「調律」恢復秩序，世界原本的姿態也逐漸展現在眼前。在地圖上逐步探索未知的地點，欣賞豐富故事文本與精心繪製的繪本插畫，途中發現的道具就像是旅行的紀念品。

>> 排行榜、成就、成績分享與存檔

收集劇情相關的任務成就，向好友分享成績結算畫面，並在排行榜上與全世界音樂遊戲好手競爭。遊戲支援雲端存檔。

hk.description:
在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

- 去除廣告！

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

mo.releaseNotes: Thank you for playing Evoland 2! We're keeping the game up to date and fixing issues.
mo.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

mo.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕
• 播放速度控制

• 上傳日期篩選：按天、週、月或年
FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。
如何激活？
點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！

怎麼知道它是否開啟？
啟動時圖標會變紅。

非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！

mo.trackName: 國家天氣Pro-15日即時天氣預報&空氣品質
mo.description:
国家天氣Pro（National weather pro) - 即時提供未來15天天氣預報、全球雷達、颱風實時路徑及預報、地震、空氣品質、未來15天（360小時）每小時天氣預報、花粉過敏、釣魚、室外運動、降雨概率、當前即時天氣等功能。無廣告免費天氣App。

****準確、即時、15日天氣預報****
    即時更新當前天氣。
    定位地址精確到街道門牌號，天氣精確到所在位置周邊1.2KM範圍內。
    更新地址，即時更新天氣信息。
    15日全球天氣預報，出行計劃更保障。

****15日（360小時）每小時天氣預報****
    未來15日，每個小時的天氣情況
    每小時支持天氣、溫度、體感溫度、氣壓、紫外線、露點、能見度、風向、風速、雲層覆蓋率、降雨概率、降雨量、降雪量、釣魚指數、運動指數等等
    更細緻準確的出行規劃

****地震****
    支持近200年，共72萬條地震記錄。並即時更新最新地震信息。
    地震可在地圖內展示，提供地震震級、強度、深度，致死率預估、強度圖、影響城市，海嘯、山體滑坡、地震液化等不同等級預警。
    地震數據繁雜難懂，我們提供每個指標的通俗化提示。

****衛星雷達****
    提供颱風等級、運動路徑、影響範圍等在地圖內展示。
    支持雷達、雲圖、24小時降雨量、24小時降雪量、雷電、溫度、體感溫度、紫外線、露點、溫度、駕駛難度信息及未來預報，在地圖上展示。

****Apple Watch****
    支持Apple Watch，以及錶盤複雜功能。

****支持 Widget****
    支持桌面widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度，未來6小時天氣及未來2天天氣預報
    支持鎖屏widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度等。

****花粉過敏預報****
    為花粉過敏用戶提供未來15天的所在位置的花粉過敏信息

****生活指數****
    釣魚：支持未來15天每小時釣魚指數
    運動：支持未來15天每小時運動指數
    是否攜帶雨傘提醒
    防曬指數及提醒
    穿衣指數及提醒
    洗車至少及提醒
    顯示當前日期日曆

****個性、美觀****
    收錄各地美麗風景作為天氣背景圖片，更簡潔美觀
    用戶可以自定義壁紙，更有個性，將您喜愛的圖片設置為天氣背景

【訂閱功能說明】
取消方法：請用戶手動在蘋果設備【設定】>>【iTunesStore與App Store】>>選擇【Apple ID】>>點擊即【查看Apple ID】>>在賬戶設置界面點擊【訂閱】>>取消國家天氣的訂閱即可。

【專業天氣套餐自動續訂價格】
購買3個月專業天氣套餐 每3個月將以$0.99美元的價格購買和自動續費
購買6個月專業天氣套餐 每6個月將以$1.99美元的價格購買和自動續費
購買12個月專業天氣套餐 每12個月將以$3.49美元的價格購買和自動續費
自動續費扣款時機：定於其結束前1天自動續費延續。在訂閱結束前1天取消,則訂閱方案會停止。

mo.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

領導壯大中的德國軍隊東進或投身蘇維埃保衛祖國俄羅斯。在FROZEN FRONT中化身一位聰穎的指揮官，正確選擇戰爭策略，獲得更高的軍銜。

任務簡報

在1941年東部戰線的刺骨嚴寒中戰鬥！
指揮坦克和步兵 攻克敵陣！

mo.description:
用悠揚樂聲拯救世界，全新體驗的繪本風角色扮演音樂遊戲！
扮演主角探索地圖，以音樂遊戲進行「調律」，讓黑白無聲的世界恢復生機。
隨著劇情演進，逐步解鎖遊玩多樣風格的樂曲，享受令人震撼的boss關卡演出，與欣賞精美的繪本故事！

《獎項與成就》

2016 國際行動遊戲大獎 1st IMGA SEA「最佳音樂音效獎 Excellence in Audio」
2016 GAME STAR遊戲之星票選Taiwan Indie Game項目金獎
2017 台北國際電玩展 獨立遊戲獎 Indie Game Award 「最佳音樂音效獎 Best Audio」
2017 13th IMGA Global 入圍
2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia 「最佳行動遊戲 Best Mobile Game」 入圍

《遊戲特色》

>> 新穎動感的音樂遊戲

獨創多變的盤面動畫，隨著音樂節奏點擊滑動，遊玩數十位作曲家創作的高品質樂曲，和觀看魄力十足的boss關卡特別演出。我們為音樂遊戲的初學者到專業玩家分別打造適合的難易度與挑戰課題，鍛鍊自己的實力同時解鎖隱藏要素吧！

>> 精緻迷人的繪本故事

「我相信，受音律眷顧的你一定可以恢復世界原本的秩序。」
當各地點的紊亂能量藉由「調律」恢復秩序，世界原本的姿態也逐漸展現在眼前。在地圖上逐步探索未知的地點，欣賞豐富故事文本與精心繪製的繪本插畫，途中發現的道具就像是旅行的紀念品。

>> 排行榜、成就、成績分享與存檔

收集劇情相關的任務成就，向好友分享成績結算畫面，並在排行榜上與全世界音樂遊戲好手競爭。遊戲支援雲端存檔。

《官方連結》

官方網站：http://noxygames.com/lanota/
隱私權政策與服務條款：https://noxygames.com/lanota/privacy.html

在Facebook追蹤我們：https://www.facebook.com/lanota/
Twitter: @Noxy_Lanota  /  @Noxy_Lanota_EN
Discord: https://discord.gg/lanota

mo.description:
在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！
- 一流遊戲「  Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集
- 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！
- 擁有可愛綿羊的模擬遊戲
- 照顧好羊羣
- 飼養甜美的小羔羊
- 積極和羊羣玩耍
- 給牠們提供許多不同的物品
- 種植並收割不同的資源
- 剪羊毛
- 自定義農場
- 控制天氣
- 日夜循環
- 3D 世界中的開放式遊戲設定
- 適合兒童，但全家人一起玩也非常有趣
- 支持MFi遊戲手柄
- 支持Game Center

mo.description:
將自己小村莊建成一個恢宏的中世紀帝國，打造繁榮的經濟和幸福的居民！尋覓採礦點，收割農作物，向國民徵收稅幣。營建角鬥場、酒館、市場，並用精美的雕塑、壯麗的紀念碑以及蔥郁的花園美化自己的城市。但是，仍然危機四伏。強盜在附近出沒，尋機掠奪和打劫您的和平城鎮。營建兵營，招募勇敢的士兵，建造守衛塔，保護你的鎮民免受傷害。從自己的城堡統治整個帝國，確保臣民歡樂幸福！

特色
- 去除廣告！
- 中世紀的各種城市營建方式
- 聰明的居民忙碌於日常事務
- 複雜經濟模擬，深度生產鏈
- 數十種不同的城鎮和生產建物
- 軍事功能可選，可訓練士兵，智鬥強盜
- 季節、天氣，都有意義，都有效果
- 火災、疫病、乾旱及更多毀滅性災難
- 豐富多樣的情景和挑戰任務
- 無限制的沙盒遊戲模式
- 支持Game Center

tw.releaseNotes:
Greetings, Property Tycoons!


We’ve been rolling out updates, polishing features, and preparing something exciting just for you!
A new game mode featuring the Speed Die is racing into MONOPOLY very soon!
Get ready for faster turns, quicker grabs, and high-stakes moves.


Stay tuned, it’s almost time to speed things up!
tw.description:
Play Hasbro’s official Monopoly board game by yourself, with family and friends or players around the world. Play online or offline on your mobile or tablet. It’s the game you love with no ads!
It's the #1 Paid board game in over 100 countries - with 3 Millions Downloads since launch.

"Monopoly on mobile includes cross-platform online multiplayer, which means you can open up a lobby, have your friends join your games, and all play together in perfect harmony. Beautiful, right?” Dave Aubrey - PocketGamer

This is a fully immersive board game experience with amazing graphics and animations. The whole classic game is available with no ads, so you get the fun of the Monopoly board game without distractions. Invite your friends and family to game night with one of the app stores favourite top paid games.


POPULAR FEATURES
One of the greatest board games 
Play the Hasbro classic Monopoly game by yourself, with family and friends or players around the world on your mobile or tablet!

Full, ad-free game
Play the complete classic game with no pay-to-win or ad pop-ups. Roll the dice and risk it all to become the wealthiest landlord tycoon on the board!

House rules
Put the official Hasbro rule book down and play with your favourite house rules

Quick mode
Roll the dice, risk it all and get paid - finish the board game faster than ever

Single player
Play against our challenging AI - no need for family and friends 

Offline multiplayer 
Pass a single device between up to 4 players for an offline wifi-free experience

Online multiplayer 
Distance doesn’t interrupt play when you connect with fans around the world or invite friends and family to a private game

The Complete Collection 
Be the top landlord tycoon on new themed boards, exclusive to the mobile game. With 10 boards, no 2 games are the same! Risk it all in the L.A. Monstropolis alternate universe. Be spooked in Transylvania. See the future in New York 2121, or travel back in time to Victorian London, Historic Tokyo, Belle Époque era Paris and 1930s Atlantic City! Unlock new player pieces, properties and chance cards with each theme!


HOW TO PLAY
Choose your player mode
Play this classic Hasbro board game in a variety of online and offline player modes. Put your landlord skills to the test against our challenging AI opponents and be a property tycoon in single player mode. Compete with friends and family wherever you are in online multiplayer. Play WiFi-free when you pass & play one device around a group of players. The choice is yours as you buy up the board!

Select your rules
If you’re one of the many people who have never actually read the rules of Monopoly, you can still play the game exactly how you like! Play without auctions, add cash to Free Parking, or pay $400 for landing directly on GO! Choose to stick to the classic Hasbro rule book, get a fixed selection of the most popular house rules, or customise your rules to suit your own preferences! 

Choose your piece
Choose from the modern and classic player pieces, including: scottie, cat, T-rex, rubber duck, the car, the top hat and the battleship!

Enter the board
Experience the thrill of bankrupting your family and friends and becoming the wealthiest landlord tycoon on the board! It’s just as you remember, plus fun animations and an AI banker who’s on everyone’s side!

Build your property empire
Roll the dice, take investment risks, bid for properties in auctions, make your way around the board and BUY real estate, COLLECT rent and BUILD hotels to become a property tycoon.

Play Marmalade Game Studio’s multiplayer games with friends and family wherever you are! Our online games with friends include Clue/Cluedo, The Game of Life, The Game of Life 2 and Battleship.

tw.releaseNotes:
• Option to enable video stabilization.
• 8mm Pro subscribers: import LUT files(cube & 3dl) to create your own filters!
tw.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

tw.trackName: 國家天氣Pro-15日即時天氣預報&空氣品質
tw.description:
国家天氣Pro（National weather pro) - 即時提供未來15天天氣預報、全球雷達、颱風實時路徑及預報、地震、空氣品質、未來15天（360小時）每小時天氣預報、花粉過敏、釣魚、室外運動、降雨概率、當前即時天氣等功能。無廣告免費天氣App。

****準確、即時、15日天氣預報****
    即時更新當前天氣。
    定位地址精確到街道門牌號，天氣精確到所在位置周邊1.2KM範圍內。
    更新地址，即時更新天氣信息。
    15日全球天氣預報，出行計劃更保障。

****15日（360小時）每小時天氣預報****
    未來15日，每個小時的天氣情況
    每小時支持天氣、溫度、體感溫度、氣壓、紫外線、露點、能見度、風向、風速、雲層覆蓋率、降雨概率、降雨量、降雪量、釣魚指數、運動指數等等
    更細緻準確的出行規劃

****地震****
    支持近200年，共72萬條地震記錄。並即時更新最新地震信息。
    地震可在地圖內展示，提供地震震級、強度、深度，致死率預估、強度圖、影響城市，海嘯、山體滑坡、地震液化等不同等級預警。
    地震數據繁雜難懂，我們提供每個指標的通俗化提示。

****衛星雷達****
    提供颱風等級、運動路徑、影響範圍等在地圖內展示。
    支持雷達、雲圖、24小時降雨量、24小時降雪量、雷電、溫度、體感溫度、紫外線、露點、溫度、駕駛難度信息及未來預報，在地圖上展示。

****Apple Watch****
    支持Apple Watch，以及錶盤複雜功能。

****支持 Widget****
    支持桌面widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度，未來6小時天氣及未來2天天氣預報
    支持鎖屏widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度等。

****花粉過敏預報****
    為花粉過敏用戶提供未來15天的所在位置的花粉過敏信息

****生活指數****
    釣魚：支持未來15天每小時釣魚指數
    運動：支持未來15天每小時運動指數
    是否攜帶雨傘提醒
    防曬指數及提醒
    穿衣指數及提醒
    洗車至少及提醒
    顯示當前日期日曆

****個性、美觀****
    收錄各地美麗風景作為天氣背景圖片，更簡潔美觀
    用戶可以自定義壁紙，更有個性，將您喜愛的圖片設置為天氣背景

【訂閱功能說明】
取消方法：請用戶手動在蘋果設備【設定】>>【iTunesStore與App Store】>>選擇【Apple ID】>>點擊即【查看Apple ID】>>在賬戶設置界面點擊【訂閱】>>取消國家天氣的訂閱即可。

【專業天氣套餐自動續訂價格】
購買3個月專業天氣套餐 每3個月將以$0.99美元的價格購買和自動續費
購買6個月專業天氣套餐 每6個月將以$1.99美元的價格購買和自動續費
購買12個月專業天氣套餐 每12個月將以$3.49美元的價格購買和自動續費
自動續費扣款時機：定於其結束前1天自動續費延續。在訂閱結束前1天取消,則訂閱方案會停止。

自動續訂服務協議：http://u3dyouxi.com/weather/subscribe.html

tw.releaseNotes: Thank you for playing Evoland 2! We're keeping the game up to date and fixing issues.
tw.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

tw.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

tw.description:
用悠揚樂聲拯救世界，全新體驗的繪本風角色扮演音樂遊戲！
扮演主角探索地圖，以音樂遊戲進行「調律」，讓黑白無聲的世界恢復生機。
隨著劇情演進，逐步解鎖遊玩多樣風格的樂曲，享受令人震撼的boss關卡演出，與欣賞精美的繪本故事！

《獎項與成就》

2016 國際行動遊戲大獎 1st IMGA SEA「最佳音樂音效獎 Excellence in Audio」
2016 GAME STAR遊戲之星票選Taiwan Indie Game項目金獎
2017 台北國際電玩展 獨立遊戲獎 Indie Game Award 「最佳音樂音效獎 Best Audio」
2017 13th IMGA Global 入圍
2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia 「最佳行動遊戲 Best Mobile Game」 入圍

《遊戲特色》

>> 新穎動感的音樂遊戲

獨創多變的盤面動畫，隨著音樂節奏點擊滑動，遊玩數十位作曲家創作的高品質樂曲，和觀看魄力十足的boss關卡特別演出。我們為音樂遊戲的初學者到專業玩家分別打造適合的難易度與挑戰課題，鍛鍊自己的實力同時解鎖隱藏要素吧！

>> 精緻迷人的繪本故事

「我相信，受音律眷顧的你一定可以恢復世界原本的秩序。」
當各地點的紊亂能量藉由「調律」恢復秩序，世界原本的姿態也逐漸展現在眼前。在地圖上逐步探索未知的地點，欣賞豐富故事文本與精心繪製的繪本插畫，途中發現的道具就像是旅行的紀念品。

>> 排行榜、成就、成績分享與存檔

收集劇情相關的任務成就，向好友分享成績結算畫面，並在排行榜上與全世界音樂遊戲好手競爭。遊戲支援雲端存檔。

Twitter: @Noxy_Lanota  /  @Noxy_Lanota_EN
Discord: https://discord.gg/lanota

tw.description:
在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！
- 一流遊戲「  Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集
- 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！
- 擁有可愛綿羊的模擬遊戲
- 照顧好羊羣
- 飼養甜美的小羔羊
- 積極和羊羣玩耍
- 給牠們提供許多不同的物品
- 種植並收割不同的資源
- 剪羊毛
- 自定義農場
- 控制天氣
- 日夜循環
- 3D 世界中的開放式遊戲設定
- 適合兒童，但全家人一起玩也非常有趣
- 支持MFi遊戲手柄
- 支持Game Center

將自己小村莊建成一個恢宏的中世紀帝國，打造繁榮的經濟和幸福的居民！尋覓採礦點，收割農作物，向國民徵收稅幣。營建角鬥場、酒館、市場，並用精美的雕塑、壯麗的紀念碑以及蔥郁的花園美化自己的城市。但是，仍然危機四伏。強盜在附近出沒，尋機掠奪和打劫您的和平城鎮。營建兵營，招募勇敢的士兵，建造守衛塔，保護你的鎮民免受傷害。從自己的城堡統治整個帝國，確保臣民歡樂幸福！

us.releaseNotes: Thank you for playing Evoland 2! We're keeping the game up to date and fixing issues.
us.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence

Celebrating the release of Evoland 2, with minor fixes and improving overall performance. Thank you for playing Evoland!
us.description:
Evoland is an action adventure game that takes you on a journey through the history of classic adventure and RPG gaming.

As you progress through the game, you unlock new technologies, gameplay systems and ever-improving graphics. From monochrome to full 3D graphics and from turn-based battles to real-time boss fights, Evoland makes you live the evolution of adventure gaming – all with plenty of humour and nods to moments from classic games.

 - Play through the history of action-adventure video games

us.description:
Welcome to RadarOmega, the next-generation weather app that takes high-resolution weather data to a whole new level. More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm.

Dedicated to providing solutions to our industry, RadarOmega created an exclusive network of weather stations featuring live video and sensor data called cyclonePORT. RadarOmega and cyclonePORT work closely with universities, emergency managers, broadcast meteorologists, and more to provide solutions for relaying critical weather information when life-threatening weather situations are imminent.

RadarOmega provides high-resolution radar data for the United States, Canada, Germany, Australia, and South Korea.

us.description:
Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you!
Highlight Features:
• Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos’ audio in the background.
• Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos.
• Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free.
• Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat.
It also includes:
• Toggleable subtitles
• Playback speed control
• Quality selection and fullscreen mode
• Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search)
• Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year
FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!

Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube

BASIC FEATURES
• Fullscreen high-quality video playback
• Easy-to-use interface, friendly design
• Skip forward or rewind anytime — never miss the best parts
• Subtitle activation
• Adjust playback speed to your preference
• Change video quality
• Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all
• Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content
• Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news
• Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video
• Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device
• VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions)
• No account required
• We don’t store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission — watch safely
• Interface available in 29 languages
• NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS
Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience — ad-free and subscription-free.

Minimum Requirements:
• iOS 13 or later
• 3G connection or higher

Privacy Policy:
https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube
Terms of Service:

us.description:
--

Awards:
● 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection
● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual
● Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

us.description:
In this eagerly anticipated sequel of the game “Clouds & Sheep”, the cute sheep are finally on the loose again! Solve countless quests and fulfill your wooly friends’ needs. Plant grass, flowers, trees and shear your animals’ different-colored wool to stock up your resources! Collect happy stars, harvest wood and flower petals and use them to provide your flock with food, accessories, toys and more! Control the clouds and make it rain to ensure your sheep never run out of fresh water to drink. If your sheep feel happy and content, they’ll bring tiny lambs into the world!

Every single animal is asking for your attention! The fluffy balls of wool love to be entertained. Make your sheep jump and use different toys like the trampoline, the seesaw and the swing to actively play with them! Watch your pets interact with each other and observe their reactions to the objects you give to them! Customize your flock’s pasture with fun objects and choose between different settings like the Wild West or Pirate scenery. Watch your flock run around by day and sleep by the cozy campfire at night. Do everything you can to keep your sheep happy and healthy to prevent them from becoming big, cottony clouds in the sky.

Features:
- PLAY WITHOUT ADS!
- Awesome sequel of the top game “Clouds & Sheep”
- Go on an epic adventure to find the legendary Fountain of Youth!
- Simulation game with adorable sheep
- Take care of your flock
- Raise sweet little lambs
- Actively play with your animals
- Give them many different items and objects

- Control the weather

tr.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

tr.description:
--

Awards:
● 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection
● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual
● Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

tr.description:
Save the world by the power of music in this dynamic & refreshing rhythm game!
Play the tunes and follow the rhythm, explore and revive the world. Unlock music of various genres, conquer specially designed boss-stages, and indulge in an artistic picture book!

AWARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS 

2016 1st IMGA SEA “Excellence in Audio”
2017 Taipei Game Show Indie Game Award “Best Audio”
2017 13th IMGA Global Nominee
2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia “Best Mobile Game” Nominee

FEATURES

>> Innovative and Dynamic Rhythm Game

Not the rhythm game you used to know: we add unique animation to the plate you'll be playing on. Dozens of fantastic music tracks and amazing boss-stage features, different charts and challenges; gentle or intense, beginners, advanced players and experts can all have their game!

>> Artistic and Refreshing Picture Book

"I trust that you, the one blessed by the gods of melody, can surely revive the former world order."
"Tune" the chaotic energy back to harmony, and the world will gradually reveal. Explore places on the map, read a beautifully handcrafted picture book, and collect items on the way as souvenir!

>> Achievement, Leaderboard, and More

Collect achievements as the story progress, share your results to friends, and compete with other players on the leaderboard. Supports cloud save.

tr.description:
In this eagerly anticipated sequel of the game “Clouds & Sheep”, the cute sheep are finally on the loose again! Solve countless quests and fulfill your wooly friends’ needs. Plant grass, flowers, trees and shear your animals’ different-colored wool to stock up your resources! Collect happy stars, harvest wood and flower petals and use them to provide your flock with food, accessories, toys and more! Control the clouds and make it rain to ensure your sheep never run out of fresh water to drink. If your sheep feel happy and content, they’ll bring tiny lambs into the world!

Every single animal is asking for your attention! The fluffy balls of wool love to be entertained. Make your sheep jump and use different toys like the trampoline, the seesaw and the swing to actively play with them! Watch your pets interact with each other and observe their reactions to the objects you give to them! Customize your flock’s pasture with fun objects and choose between different settings like the Wild West or Pirate scenery. Watch your flock run around by day and sleep by the cozy campfire at night. Do everything you can to keep your sheep happy and healthy to prevent them from becoming big, cottony clouds in the sky.

Features:
- PLAY WITHOUT ADS!
- Awesome sequel of the top game “Clouds & Sheep”
- Go on an epic adventure to find the legendary Fountain of Youth!
- Simulation game with adorable sheep
- Take care of your flock
- Raise sweet little lambs
- Actively play with your animals
- Give them many different items and objects
- Grow and harvest various resources
- Shear your sheep
- Customize their pasture
- Control the weather
- Day-night cycle
- Open-ended game set in a 3D world
- Suitable for kids, but also fun for the whole family
- MFi game controller support
- Game Center support

Thank you for playing ‘Clouds & Sheep 2’!

tr.description:
Develop your tiny village to a grand medieval empire with a thriving economy and happy villagers! Find spots for mining ore, harvest the crops of your farms and collect coins as taxes from your folk. Build jousting fields, taverns, marketplaces and beautify your city with impressive statues, magnificent monuments, and lush gardens. But there are also dangers lurking close by. Bandits are in the area, looking to plunder and pillage your peaceful town. Build barracks, guard towers and recruit brave soldiers to protect your citizens from harm. You rule the whole empire from your castle and make sure your inhabitants have fun and stay happy!

FEATURES
- PLAY WITHOUT ADS!
- City-building gameplay set in medieval times
- Cute inhabitants with their own daily routines
- Complex economy sim and deep production chains
- Dozens of different town and production buildings
- Optional military feature with soldiers and bandits
- Meaningful seasons and weather effects
- Devastating disasters like fire, disease, drought and many more
- Diverse scenarios and challenging tasks
- Unrestricted sandbox gameplay mode
- Game Center support

tr.description:
Apple’s App of the Year with over 15 million downloads and 200,000 5-star ratings globally, Day One has reinvented journaling letting you record your life as you live it. Securely save audio, video, photos, notes, and more in the world’s most trusted digital journal. 

“Day One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.” – New York Times

“Day One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.” – Wired

“This superb journaling app remains pleasant to behold, easy to use, and a tough act for any rival to follow.” – Macworld

WHY DAY ONE?

Day One is the original journal app and a decade of updates and feature additions make it the most private, trusted, and easiest-to-use journaling platform in the world. 

SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE

• Beautiful, award-winning design
• Unlimited text entries 
• Unlimited photos and videos*
• Powerful rich text formatting with markdown
• Different journals for every aspect of your life*

PRIVATE AND SECURE 

• Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe
• End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private
• Journal entries stay secure with passcode or TouchID
• Export options (pdf, plain text, JSON, etc.) ensure your entries always stay yours

FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT 

• Programmable reminder notifications
• Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer’s cramp 
• Customizable templates save time and add organization to entries
• Today view provides a summary of where you’ve been and what you’ve done

JOURNAL FROM WHEREVER, WHENEVER

• Cross-platform apps available on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac 
• The ability to email entries straight to your journal

BUILT FOR REMINISCING

• On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories
• Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you’re looking for
• Map view quickly shows all the places you’ve journaled from

*Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. Additional features, including unlimited photos, videos, and sync are available with a Day One Premium membership. Start a free trial today.
